title: Flibonakki
text:
G(n) is defined asG(n) = G(n-1) + f(4n-1)   , for n > 0and    G(0) = 0f(i) is ith Fibonacci number. Given n you need to evaluate G(n) modulo 1000000007.InputFirst line contains number of test cases t (t < 40000). Each of the next t lines contain an integer n (0 <= n < 2^51).OutputFor each test case print G(n) modulo 1000000007.ExampleInput:2
2
4Output:15
714
